full_text: Incident Report CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE J6-6702 DRAFT Reported Date 01/21/2006 Nature of Call Officer ALLEN, AUTUMN 498 CHATTIN DRIVE (678) 493-4200 Administrative Information Agency CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE Report No 06-6702 Supplement No 0001 Reported Date 01/21/2006 Reported Time 15:30 Officer 000284 / ALLEN, AUTUMN Assignment CID DAY SHIFT PERSONS UNIT Approving Officer  Assignment CID DAY SHIFT PERSONS UNIT Entered by 000284 Approval Time  Approval Date  Narrative On 012106 I was notified by dispatch to give B-43 a call. I called and spoke with D/S Ballard and he was taking a report of a missing juvenile age 15. He stated she was supposed to have went to a basketball game last night but she didn't. He stated she went off with some black males. He told they were stopped by some white friends of her and they fought with the black males. D/S Ballard said the mother had contact with her daughter around 8:00 last night but had not heard from her since then. Report Officer 000284 / ALLEN, AUTUMN Printed At 06/06/2006 11:12 Page 1 of 1 07/26/17 Page 7 of 95 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031004

text_blocks.content: Incident Report CHEROKEE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE J6-6702 DRAFT Reported Date 01/21/2006 Nature of Call Officer ALLEN, AUTUMN 498 CHATTIN DRIVE (678) 493-4200

Narrative On 012106 I was notified by dispatch to give B-43 a call. I called and spoke with D/S Ballard and he was taking a report of a missing juvenile age 15. He stated she was supposed to have went to a basketball game last night but she didn't. He stated she went off with some black males. He told they were stopped by some white friends of her and they fought with the black males. D/S Ballard said the mother had contact with her daughter around 8:00 last night but had not heard from her since then.
Report Officer 000284 / ALLEN, AUTUMN Printed At 06/06/2006 11:12 Page 1 of 1 07/26/17 Page 7 of 95 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031004
